projects.name: EventR
projects.text: EventR, Soft Pauer's latest app, revolutionizes travel and event management for individuals and companies. Users easily input travel details like flights, car rentals, hotels, and events. Once added, plans can be shared with partners or family. Key details such as flight numbers and hotel bookings are neatly displayed on a shared timeline for all travelers.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.text: My Next.js web portfolio presents my skills and projects dynamically and responsively. Utilizing Next.js' server-side rendering, I've designed a platform that loads quickly and offers a smooth user journey. Prioritizing customization and performance, this project embodies my commitment to excellence and creativity in web development.
